Title: Buongiorno Italia
Actors: Mahendra Perera, Sangeetha Weeraratne, Jackson Anthony, Kamal Addaraarachchi
Plot: Mille Soya, is a film depicting a dangerous and hazardous journey by a young Sri Lankan group to rich Europe. They are subject to deceptions by the intermediaries, betrayals by friends, arrests while crossing the borders and even death.
